Class: MessageCache

MessageCache()

MessageCache represents a cache of messages that have been consumed, but not yet passed to the user. It has a dynamic capacity, increased or decreased based on requirement.

Constructor

new MessageCache()

Source:
  • kafkajs/_consumer.js, line 41

Methods

clear()

Clears the cache.
Source:
  • kafkajs/_consumer.js, line 64

decreaseMaxSize(recvdSize)

Request a size decrease. It decreases the size to 80% of the last received size, with a minimum of 1.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
recvdSize number the number of messages received in the last poll.
Source:
  • kafkajs/_consumer.js, line 96

increaseMaxSize()

Request a size increase. It increases the size by 2x, but only if the size is less than 1024, only if the size has been requested to be increased twice in a row.
Source:
  • kafkajs/_consumer.js, line 79
Returns:

next()

Source:
  • kafkajs/_consumer.js, line 115
Returns:
The next element in the cache or null if none exists.

setCache(messages)

Sets cache and resets all the indices and timer.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
messages *
